title: AC seals five shops for selling sugar at exorbitant prices
content:
ISLAMABAD, Sep 10 (APP): In a crackdown on profiteers, Assistant Commissioner Pothohar Nahel Hafiz on Sunday sealed five shops, and seized 100 KG sugar for selling at exorbitant prices in H-13, Golra Morr and Jhangi Syedan localities.
He visited shops along with a team of officials from the Food Department. He checked the prices of sugar and found that they were much higher than the government-set rates.
The shopkeepers were warned that they would face further action if they continued to sell sugar at exorbitant prices.
The Assistant Commissionerâ€™s action is a welcome step in the fight against profiteering. It is hoped that this will send a strong message to other shopkeepers and deter them from selling essential commodities at inflated prices.
